awards.text: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: This movie re-creates the life stories of the members of the rock group "The Beach Boys". The film focuses primarily on the Wilson brothers and their parents, but also includes stories about the rest of members of the band. A two-part television movie special.

title: The Beach Boys: An American Family
